definition: to visit a place for the memories/to pay homage to (the deceased)
to lean against/to rely on/on the basis of/no matter (how, what etc)/proof
a string of 100 cash (arch.)/to lament/to condole with/variant of 吊[diao4]

sentences.english: Only pay the remaining trace of the heart.
sentences.chinese: 剩下的只有被憑弔的一絲心情。

sentences.english: Here has become martyrs Remembrance of the past later pondered the historical sites.
sentences.chinese: 這裏已成爲後人憑弔先烈追憶往事的歷史遺址。

sentences.english: They used to visit her grave twice a year.
sentences.chinese: 他們以前每年去她的墓前憑弔兩次。

sentences.english: This morning, recalling the grave, I went to pay a visit to it.
sentences.chinese: 我今朝回想起來，又一人走來憑弔。

sentences.english: After the opening ceremony and all staff visit a memorial, to pay homage dead miners.
sentences.chinese: 揭牌儀式後，全體人員參觀紀念館，憑弔死難礦工。

sentences.english: Having recalled it again, I went there to pay a visit.
sentences.chinese: 我今朝回想起來，又一人走來憑弔。

sentences.english: I love to grieve for the buried riotous year.
sentences.chinese: 獨自憑弔已埋葬的火熱的一年。

definition: to restore old way/to return to the past
marble pillar (ornamental column in front of places, tombs)
nuée ardente/hot cloud of volcanic ash
to depart this life/to be no more
variant of 勸誡|劝诫[quan4 jie4]
Baqiao District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi
